Replies.Reply: As far as con man stories go, I think I've heard them all.
The two brothers and an oafish FOSTER FATHER sit eating breakfast.
had been through several foster families.

Another home, another main street.

One school, which meant one tight-

loved, rooted, happy as you please.

A fiction made for profit, in which both boys played a part.

...and straight from church, into the woods Bloom led.

quitting, Stephen. I'm out.' Then I say...
